wikipedia_page.main: Michael Blackburn  (born 1954) is a British poet.

response: **Michael Blackburn (athlete) (born 1970), Australian Olympic medallist and sailor
Michael Blackburn is the name of:
*Michael Blackburn (sailor) (born 1970), Australian Olympic medallist and sailor
* "The Scythe of Saturn" (fiction) in: Michael Blackburn, Jon Silkin and Lorna Tracy (ed.), Stand One (London: Victor Gollancz, 1984), pp. 93–115.
